name: A Cow Who Likes To Whistle
lyric:
I'm a cow who likes to whistle

And it makes the barnyard bristle

When I go

I'm a cow
How do you do

Excuse me if I don't say moo
I'd rather

All my friends say I should try to fit in well well

But I'm so happy and you can be happy

When you learn to be yourself

I'm a cat who likes to scat

So if you want to have a nice chat
Then I'll go

I'm a cat who does not mew

Unless I'm singing mew scooby do
So I'll go

All my friends say I should try to fit in well well

I'm so happy and you can be happy

When you learn to be yourself

I'm a snake that likes to sing

And when I sing
I s-s-swing

I'm a snake I must insist

But I don't bite and I do not hiss
I go

All my friends say I should try to fit in well well

I'm so happy and you can be happy

When you learn to be yourself

I'm a cow who likes to

I'm a cat who scats

And a swinging snake too
And we'll go
